name: Poke'em Out!
description:
Poke'em Out, like the title suggests, will allow you to poke some mean eyes with some bullets. Sounds fun? Because it most certainly is! Try it for yourself!

Poke'em Out! is simple 2D top-down-shooter, that will make you question, if it wasn't your destiny, to poke some angry eyes. Serves well as a stress reliever <3
